name: SHError
desc: An error type that you create, or the system creates, to indicate problems with a catalog, match attempt, or signature, or when saving to a user’s Shazam library.

items.name: init(Code, userInfo: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates a ShazamKit error of the specified type with the specified user information.

items.name: static var matchAttemptFailed: SHError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate when a Shazam Music catalog server issue prevents finding a match.

items.name: static var signatureInvalid: SHError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate that the system is unable to generate a signature from the audio.

items.name: static var signatureDurationInvalid: SHError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate that the length of the generated signature is too long or too short to make a match in the catalog.

items.name: static var invalidAudioFormat: SHError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate an unsupported audio format.

items.name: static var audioDiscontinuity: SHError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate the use of noncontiguous audio to request a match.

items.name: static var customCatalogInvalidURL: SHError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate that the format for the custom catalog URL is invalid.

items.name: static var customCatalogInvalid: SHError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate when the custom catalog fails to load due to an invalid format.

items.name: static var mediaLibrarySyncFailed: SHError.Code
items.desc: The error code to indicate when the system fails to add one or more media items to the user’s Shazam library.

items.name: enum SHError.Code
items.desc: Codes for the errors that Shazam produces.

items.name: var code: Code
items.desc: The error code for the instance.

items.name: var errorCode: Int
items.desc: The error code for the instance.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: Additional details about the error.

items.name: var errorUserInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: Additional details about an error.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A user-facing, localized string that describes the error.

items.name: static var errorDomain: String
items.desc: The error domain for specific errors for ShazamKit.

items.name: static func == (SHError, SHError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two ShazamKit error objects are equal.

items.name: static func != (SHError, SHError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two ShazamKit error objects are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the payment error object by feeding the item into a specified hasher.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value for the payment error.
